column4: hey, guys, I'm looking for some virus protection software for linux
preferably something that i can apt-get install
hmmm, I actually want to scan some files on my website
call me paranoid, but there is no un-rooting of a compromised machine.  same goes for viruses.
dude... you can't get a virus on linux.  if you suspect you hvave an infected file, delete it.
you don't have `rm` on your server?
do you do any hosting? you never get full access to the server
you pay for a server that you can't delete files from?
wait, let's start with your premise.  what makes you think this linux box is compromised?
